questions.text: Where did the drunk guy in the beginning say he lived?
questions.explanation:
Philadelphia.

	Rebecca decided to start a designated driver program for those that had too much to drink. Only one person took her up on it and it turned out he did not even live in Boston, or Massachusetts for that matter. Philadelphia is in Pennsylvania.

questions.text: Who did Cliff claim was a lesbian?
questions.explanation:
Rebecca.

	He said she never dated, and a good looking woman showed up. Cliff of course was wrong; the woman was Rebecca's sister.

Susan Howe.

	Susan Howe was played by Marcia Cross. Marcia Cross played Dr. Kimberly Shaw in the TV series "Melrose Place". She also played Bree Van De Kamp in the TV series "Desperate Housewives".

questions.text: How long had it been since the Howe sisters last saw each other?
questions.explanation:
3 years.

	The Howe sisters did not get along very well. As a result, they stayed away from each other, but Susan thought it was time they put away their differences and saw one another again, so she came to Cheers.

questions.text: Did Rebecca want to see her sister?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Rebecca was rather indifferent to seeing Susan. This was great news for Sam because he planned to get them back together, with an ulterior motive.

questions.text: When was the last time Rebecca was fat, according to her sister?
questions.explanation:
12 years old.

	Susan said that Rebecca was "the Goodyear blimp" back then. Rebecca retaliated the insult by saying that Susan wet her pants at an assembly when she was 6 years old.

questions.text: What was the problem between the two sisters?
questions.correct: The younger sister always stole the older sister's boyfriends.
options: One was a Republican the other was a Democrat.
questions.explanation:
The younger sister always stole the older sister's boyfriends.

	Sam used this information to tell Susan that Rebecca had a crush on him. This got Susan interested in Sam. When Rebecca found out, she became angry and told Sam she decided to use Sam to teach Susan a lesson.

questions.text: Who did Sam plan to go out with?
questions.explanation:
both.

	He was planning on taking Rebecca out first. Then, when he finished his date with her, he was going to take Susan out.

Rebecca's sister.

	Rebecca and Susan set up an entire revenge scene because Susan was an actress. They wanted to get back at Sam for trying to use them both. Rebecca shot her with a gun with blanks several times for all the boyfriends Susan stole.

questions.text: Did Sam find the shooting trick to be funny?
questions.explanation:
no.

	Sam asked Lilith if a joke like that could give a person heart failure. Lilith replied, "No, it was funny." Rebecca told Sam that he did get Susan and herself talking again which was a good thing.
